items.title: Romance Reads for Disability Pride Month!
items.description: You get fantastic disability rep along with your HEA in these romances for Disability Pride Month. Read them this month and all year round!

items.title: Must-Read Summer Books, BIPOC Edition
items.description: The latest by literary shape-shifter Silvia Moreno-Garcia, the story of teenage moms in Florida by a former Youth Poet Laureate, and more.

items.title: The Best New Light Novels Out in 2025
items.description: There's lots to love in these 2025 light novels, from historical romantasy to the tale of a caretaker of gods within a cozy garden setting.

items.title: Translated Comics That Get Into Some Real-Life Messy Drama
items.description: These comics show a Marxist Iranian childhood, the Ivory Coast during its affluent era, and the lives of married Japanese women in the '80s.

items.title: Sports + Mysteries For The Gold!
items.description: Can we get more sports mysteries, please? These three take us into the worlds of cycling, ultramarathons, and gymnastics.
